description: This source file defines a UsersController class for a web API, exposing user profile endpoints, specifically a method to retrieve the currently authenticated user's profile information.

classes.name: UsersController
classes.description: A controller class handling user profile related endpoints, requiring authorization, and providing a method to fetch current user's profile.

methods.name: Me
methods.description: Returns the profile information of the currently authenticated user. Checks if the user is authenticated and retrieves data via IUserService.
